title: Sound On: Should U.S. Send Troops to Ukraine?
itunes:title: Sound On: Should U.S. Send Troops to Ukraine?
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.
Guests: New York Republican Congressman John Katko, Bloomberg Congress reporter Laura Davison, and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
